description: Deep understanding of your foes' tics grants you the upper hand in combat.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Amateur Investigator, Studied Combatant, base attack bonus +8, 1 rank in at least one Knowledge skill, no levels in a class that has the inspiration class feature.

sections.text: Your bonuses for Studied Combatant increase to a +4 insight bonus on melee attack rolls and a +4 bonus on damage rolls. This feat otherwise works like the Studied Combatant feat.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: 1 rank in at least one Knowledge skill
no levels in a class that has the inspiration class feature
name: Improved Studied Combatant
